properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 4:27PM CST until January 29 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Wichita KS
properties.description:
* WHAT...Wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two
inches possible.

* WHERE...McPherson, Marion and Chase Counties.

* WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Roads and highways will be slick in spots, especially
on elevated surfaces, and especially after the sun sets.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow may mix with sleet and rain at
times. Most snow accumulation will be limited to grassy and
elevated surfaces.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT
